# supabase_function (Data Source)

Function DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "supabase_function" "my_function" {
  ref  = "...my_ref..."
  slug = "...my_slug..."
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `ref` (String) Project ref
- `slug` (String) Function slug

- `entrypoint_path` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

- `import_map_path` (String)

- `updated_at` (Number)
